content: This is the FHIR Developer Days 2016 channel for the Scheduling and Appointments track.

I got a test server with me that you should be able to connect to for testing appointments.
Server address in the local network is http://gbr-zb17/DIPS-WebAPI/HL7/FHIRDSTU2/ . To see what is implemented on this server go to http://gbr-zb17/DIPS-WebAPI/HL7/FHIRDSTU2/metadata. Example patient for appointments can be found by calling http://gbr-zb17/DIPS-WebAPI/HL7/FHIRDSTU2/Appointment?patient=15418247107
gbr-zb17 doesnt seem to work very well so try http://10.40.14.148/DIPS-WebAPI/HL7/FHIRDSTU2/metadata instead
